content: शय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (या, --यी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [शी-अच्] Lying down, sleeping (usually at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); रात्रिजागरपरो दिवाशयः <ls>R. 19. 34</ls>; so उत्तानशय, पार्श्वशय, वृक्षेशय, बिलेशय &c. --यः {@--1@} Sleep. {@--2@} A bed, couch. {@--3@} A hand. {@--4@} A snake, especially the boa. {@--5@} Abuse, imprecation, curse. {@--6@} A stake.
